author: CBS News
title: Trump Winery eligible for bailout in virus relief law
description: Stimulus bans on Trump family aid don't apply to $9.5 billion fund for producers of "specialty crops" that include grapes.
content: President Donald Trump's Virginia vineyard could be eligible for a federal bailout under the $2.2 trillion coronavirus stimulus he signed into law last month, despite provisions in the bill that Democrats said were intended to prevent him and his family from … [+4882 chars]
